item.title: [Summary] (Syll) What is Ergodicity?
item.description: What is Ergodicity? Lars P. Syll. https://larspsyll.wordpress.com/2016/11/23/what-is-ergodicity-2/ . Nov 23, 2016. A random process is ergodic if all of its statistics can be determined from a sample function of the process. That is, the ensemble averages equal the corresponding time averages with probability one. Role of Ergodicity in Human Inference A newspaper has previously printed some inaccurate information, therefore, the newspaper is going to publish inaccurate information in the future.
